name: Full Stop
description:
Your inner child is concerned about how your life has changed lately. Talk to them to explore your relationship, and make sure to put a full stop to their worries.

In this small conversational game you can make choices by deciding where the "full stop" of your sentence goes.

It was developed in the trijam #195 game jam, in which the theme was "cut your loses".

☀ I developed the game using Twine, for the first time ever!

☀ I made the art using Procreate.

☀ I created my own font (outside of the development time) using the website calligraphr:
